title: Protocol for pesticide residue monitoring and risk assessment on water, sediment, and fish: A case study of two selected reservoirs in Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Abdou Orou-Seko, Dennis Chirawurah, Jean-Pierre Gnimatin, Edéya Orobiyi Rodrigue Pèlèbè, Joyce Aputere Ndago, Doris Pwatirah, Martin Nyaaba Adokiya
